author: wtopstaff
title: Monday’s Sports Transactions
text:
By The Associated Press October 5, 2015 3:25 pm BASEBALL American League 
LOS ANGELES ANGELS — Named Billy Eppler general manager. 
OAKLAND ATHLETICS — Promoted Billy Beane to executive vice president of baseball operations and David Forst to general manager. National League 
ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS — Fired pitching coach Mike Harkey. 
MILWAUKEE BREWERS — Announced the contracts of first base coach Mike Guerrero, pitching coach Rick Kranitz, bench coach Jerry Narron, outfield coach John Shelby and bullpen coach Lee Tunnell will not be renewed. 
WASHINGTON NATIONALS — Fired manager Matt Williams, bench coach Randy Knorr, pitching coach Steve McCatty, hitting coach Rick Schu, third base coach Bobby Henley, first base coach Tony Tarasco, bullpen coach Matt LeCroy and defensive coordinator/advance coach Mark Weidemaier. FOOTBALL 
INDIANAPOLIS COLTS — Released QB Josh Johnson. 
MIAMI DOLPHINS — Fired coach Joe Philbin. Named Dan Campbell interim coach. HOCKEY National Hockey League 
NHLPA — Defenseman Mike Weaver announced his retirement. 
ARIZONA COYOTES — Assigned G Louis Domingue and LW Matthias Plachta to Springfield (AHL) and D James Melindy and LW Dan O’Donoghue to Rapid City (ECHL). Released RW Daniel Barczuk, C Cody Ferriero, D Jordan Heywood and RW Kale Kerbashian from their tryout agreements. 
BOSTON BRUINS — Waived F Max Talbot 
CALGARY FLAMES — Waived LW Mason Raymond. 
EDMONTON OILERS — Assigned F Leon Draisaitl to Bakersfield (AHL). 
MONTRAL CANADIENS — Waived G Dustin Tokarski. 
PITTSBURGH PENGUINS — Waived D Tim Erixon. 
NEW JERSEY DEVILS — Signed G Ken Appleby to a three-year, entry-level contract. 
PHILADELPHIA FLYERS — Waived D Andrew MacDonald. 
TORONTO MAPLE LEAFS — Waived D T.J. Brennan, D Andrew Campbell, C Sam Carrick, RW Matt Frattin and C Byron Froese on waivers. 
WINNIPEG JETS — Waived D Jay Harrison. American Hockey League 
AHL — Suspended Stockton C Mitchell Heard two games for a boarding incident during an Oct. 1 preseason game at San Jose. Suspended Hershey D Bobby Shea one game for an altercation during an Oct. 1 preseason game against Albany. Suspended Grand Rapids RW Joel Rechlicz for three games for a charging incident during an Oct. 2 preseason game against Lake Erie. Suspended Iowa F Kurtis Gabriel three games for his actions during an Oct. 3 preseason game against Manitoba. 
HARTFORD WOLF PACK — Reassigned F Michael Kantor to Greenville (ECHL). Loand D Kodie Curran to Greenville. Released F Alex Krushelnyski from his tryout agreement and returned him to Utah (ECHL). Released D Brett Bellemore. ECHL 
READING ROYALS — Announced Fs Kevin Goumas and Derek Mathers and Gs Connor Knapp and Martin Ouellette were loaned to the team by Lehigh Valley (AHL). Announced Fs Kevin Sundher and D Jordan Heywood have returned to the team after being released from AHL training camp. SOCCER Federation Internationale de Football Association 
FIFA — Sanctioned the Football Association of Malaysia (FAM) after serious crowd disturbances led to the abandonment of the 2018 FIFA World Cup Russia qualifying match between Malaysia and Saudi Arabia on Sept. 8. Malaysia was fined $41,000 and will play the Nov. 17 game against United Arab Emirates without spectators. TENNIS 
WTA — Named Steven Simon CEO. COLLEGE 
BROWN — Named Jim Hayes assistant gymnastics coach. Topics:
